What are the treatments for familial dysautonomia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of familial dysautonomia:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Familial Dysautonomia  - Genetic Testing Registry: Familial dysautonomia  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Riley-Day Syndrome
